data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Tuensang are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tuensang, Nagaland, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Tuensang access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Tuensang, Nagaland, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 2,163 believers in Tuensang, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Loi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Tuensang, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Tuensang, Nagaland, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the county of Tuensang, Nagaland, India has a population of 196,600.

We estimate Tuensang has 2,163 people who might know Jesus, 2,385 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 192,052 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tuensang, Nagaland, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
